articles.title: Ex-Dona Ana County jail director pleads no contest to charge
articles.description: LAS CRUCES, N.M. (AP) — The former longtime director of the Dona Ana County Detention Center has pleaded no contest to a misdemeanor marijuana possession charge.

articles.title: 2 suspects arrested in shooting deaths of couple in Garfield
articles.description: GARFIELD, N.M. (AP) — Dona Ana County sheriff's detectives have arrested two suspects in connection with the shooting deaths of a couple in their Garfield home last weekend.

articles.title: Police: Las Cruces couple tried to use stolen credit cards
articles.description: LAS CRUCES, N.M. (AP) — A married couple in Las Cruces is accused of trying to use stolen credit cards they say were found on the side of the road.

articles.author: Sputnik
articles.title: Middle School Security Guard Arrested for Groping Teacher on Campus (PHOTO)
articles.description: Tom Trujillo, a security guard working at Mesa Middle School in New Mexico, found himself behind bars Monday after police officers arrested him for sexually assaulting a teacher.

articles.author: USA TODAY, Rick Jervis, USA TODAY
articles.title: 'Abhorrent': Texas officials, advocates decry placing immigrant children in tent cities
articles.description: The first "soft-sided facilities," as the government calls them, have already been erected in Tornillo, Texas. Around 360 children will be placed there in the coming days and more could be added in the future.
